question: Is the word ashraful makhluqat present in quran. If not then why human beings are regarded as ashraful makhluqat. Can you please provide references
answer:
QUESTION

Is the word ashraful makhluqat present in quran. If not then why human beings are regarded as ashraful makhluqat. Can you please provide references

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

Allah has mentioned:

لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِي

Indeed Allah has created the human in the best of forms. (Surah Teen, verse 4)

 

This verse indicates to Insaan (humans) being the best and most noble creation of Allah.

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Ml. Ya'qoob Dadabhai,
Student Darul Iftaa
